title: Digital Skills for Business Professionals | Singapore Institute of Technology

meta.description: Learn to use technology to drive business automation and data analysis for improved decision-making processes.

text_lines: Browse Professional Exams and Preparatory Courses
Browse Professional Exams and Preparatory Courses
Learn to use technology to drive business automation and data analysis for improved decision-making processes.
Data Science and Analytics, Robotics and Automation, AI and Machine Learning
With the rapid advancement of technology, businesses now have access to numerous automation and data analytics tools to effectively navigate the digital wave.
Automation tools facilitate instant data capture and processing through technologies like the Internet of Things (IoT), particularly relevant in a Smart Nation like Singapore.

This surge in capabilities has generated an increased demand for expertise in data cleansing, transformation, and data modeling. These techniques enable users to extract insights from data, leading to more informed decision-making.

This course is designed to impart a comprehensive understanding of digital concepts and tools to business professionals through a combination of case studies and hands-on sessions using available, free, and popular software tools. It also aims to offer resources to professionals from various business units, empowering them to harness the potential of diverse data analytics and automation tools, while equipping them with essential knowledge in digital skillsets.
Sales, administrative, HR, marketing, and operational executives, as well as professionals across various business units of the organisation
The course was very interactive with many personal experiences shared by the participants, which I think is very useful and a valuable lesson.
Finance Manager, St. Andrew's Nursing Home
Effective in building effective and efficient team.
Interactive games and theory were being shared in the classroom. Experienced trainers who taught the lesson well to expectation.
To acquire an overview of big data and data analytics knowledge in business
Overview of Robotic Process Automation (RPA) and Machine Learning
To acquire an overview of RPA and machine learning
Hands-on Session in Data Analytics and RPA
To use contemporary business analytics tools, machine learning, and RPA programmes without prior programming knowledge
Lead Professional Officer, Singapore Institute of Technology
Lead Professional Officer, Singapore Institute of Technology

Janet is a Chartered Accountant (Singapore), a Certified Tableau Desktop Specialist, and Alteryx Designer Core Certified. She graduated with an Accountancy degree from the NUS and a Masters in Instructional Technology from NTU. Over the past decade, she has been passionately teaching courses in accounting, auditing, and business analytics to both students and working professionals. In June 2024, she led a masterclass on a teaching case using data analytics tools in Atlanta, USA, organised by the American Accounting Association. Currently, Janet is an academic staff member at SIT, where she teaches and mentors undergraduates. Additionally, she took up business consultant role for firms and engages in industry research projects focused on data analytics for business.
Founder and CEO of Glee Trees Pte. Ltd
Founder and CEO of Glee Trees Pte. Ltd

Mr Christopher Lim is the Founder and CEO of Glee Trees Pte. Ltd. He is the “father” of Gleematic, the company’s flagship product, which is Singapore’s first home-grown Cognitive Automation Software with an Asian focus.

This software combines Robotic Process Automation (RPA) software with Artificial Intelligence (AI) and can handle Asian languages. He has been a serial-entrepreneur with close to 20 years of experience managing overseas teams and working with global partners and distributors.
He holds a Master’s in Business Administration (MBA) from the University of Strathclyde, a Post-graduate Diploma in Statistics & Data Mining, and a Bachelor of Science Degree in Computing.
Co-Founder of Glee Trees Pte. Ltd
Co-Founder of Glee Trees Pte. Ltd
Ada Lim is the Co-Founder of Glee Trees Pte. Ltd. She is in love with Gleematic, the company’s intelligent robot, and spreads word about it as its COO.

She is a serial-entrepreneur as she has spent more than a decade in companies she has co-founded. Her previous venture was a public relations agency focusing on technology. She holds a Bachelor of Engineering (Hons) from Nanyang Technological University and an M.B.A. from the University of Strathclyde.
She is keenly interested in how robots and AI are changing the landscape of work, and enjoying her entrepreneurial journey.
Introduction to data analytics and data reporting
Overview of Big Data and Analytics, RPA, and Machine Learning
Driving productivity and efficiency for business using digitalisation tools
A Certificate of Attainment will be issued to participants who
Attend at least 75% of the course;
Undertake and pass non-credit bearing assessment during the course
Participants who meet the attendance requirement but do not pass the assessment will receive a Certificate of Participation.
The full fee for this course is S$2,180.00.
All fees above include GST. GST applies to individuals and Singapore-registered companies.
Learn more about funding schemes available
The Learn for Life token may be used for this course
There are no upcoming course runs at the moment.
Subscribe to our mailing list to learn about the latest dates as soon as they become available.
Learning for Life Series - Monisha Joy Gomez

Enrolling in SITLEARN’s Robotics Fundamentals and Advanced Robotics courses to supplement a module she was taking at school, Monisha Joy Gomez shares how attending these courses has been enriching in both academia and real-life.
Learning for Life Series - Seaw Ker Boon

He may have already traded in his student card for a staff pass, but SIT alumni and staff member Seaw Ker Boon chose to head back to the classroom to become a student once again. The aspiring software architect shares why he attended the Machine Learning courses under the SITLEARN programme.
Be introduced to creative AI, covering generative models, their applications, ethics, and hands-on experience.
Machine Learning and AI Data Analytics for the Semiconductor Industry
Learn to address semiconductor manufacturing complexities with AI and ML and gain hands-on experience using Python programming.
Data Science and Analytics, AI and Machine Learning, Executive Education
This course demystifies machine learning concepts and helps you gain technical grounding and foresight for digital transformation in business.
AI and Machine Learning, Computer Ethics and Privacy
Supported by CPA Australia, this course teaches you how to plan, design, and apply data analytics tests to identify red flags of fraud.
Accounting and Finance, Business Management, Data Science and Analytics, Audit
Specialised micro-credential for strong technical and theoretical expertise in data analytics. Earn a Specialist Certificate and stack it towards a degree in Electrical and Electronic Engineering.
BEng (Hons) Electrical & Electronic Engineering or Infrastructure & Systems Engineering
Data Science and Analytics, AI and Machine Learning, Competency-based Education
Machine Learning I: An Introduction for Absolute Beginners

This course offers an active learning approach with group activities and quizzes, providing practical knowledge to solve problems in various applications. It is mapped to the Singapore Smart Industry Readiness Index.
AI and Machine Learning, Data Science and Analytics

Exciting news! We are introducing new micro-credentials in Electrical and Electronic Engineering & Infrastructure and Systems Engineering. Be among the first to know by registering your interest today!
